Using site variables example

Success

Hello Elements!!!

At Cloud Elements, you have complete control over your integrations. We have implemented many resources for you, such as Elements, Formulas, and VDRs.

Our Elements use all the basic REST API operations, such as:

  • GET, PUT, DELETE returns 200 OK on success,
  • POST returns 201 on success

The above paragraph is an example using site variables.

Using page variables example

Cloud Elements uses Elements to make integration easy. Authentication is easy too! Using our Elements, you can authenticate an instance with ease. You can also integrate your Elements using Formulas and VDRs.

The above paragraph is an example using page variables
